title: Detection and severity assessment of obstructive sleep apnea according to deep learning of single-lead electrocardiogram signals
details: Y Zhang, Y Shi, Y Su, Z Cao, C Li, Y Xie, X Niu, Y Yuan… - Journal of sleep research
abstract: Developing a convenient detection method is important for diagnosing and treating obstructive sleep apnea. Considering availability and medical reliability, we established a deep-learning model that uses single-lead electrocardiogram signals …
